ProductInfo.Features: The Aspire V5 Series puts inspiring performance in a thin and light form.A Full HD breathes life into your entertainment and gives you hands-on control, while four built-in speakers make your enjoyment all the more sweet with great sound. The touch screen lets you accomplish tasks quickly and intuitively by simply touching your fingers to the screen. Makes use of Windows 8's advanced touch support, letting you scroll flick, pinch, zoom and rotate using up to 10 fingers.
